title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: f'(x)

1 point is earned for: f''(x)

1 point is earned for: f'(-1) = 0

1 point is earned for: f''(-2) = 0

1 point is earned for: a, b

f'(x) = 12x2 + 2ax + b

f''(x) = 24x + 2a

f'(-1) = 12 - 2a + b = 0

f''(-2) = -48 + 2a = 0

a = 24

b = -12 + 2a = 36
